2. Gitelman syndrome (GS)
3. Niemann-Pick disease type B (NPD-B)
4. Methylmalonic acidemia (MMA)
5. Propionic acidemia (PA)
6. Lactic aciduria (LA)
7. Congenital laryngeal stridor (CLS)
8. Bilateral cryptorchidism (BC)
9. Vitamin B12 deficiency (VB12D)
10. Reduced blood folate concentration (RBFC)
